meanings.definition: Inclining or bending from a vertical position
meanings.sent1: The leaning tower looked like it might fall over.
meanings.sent2: The tree was leaning slightly to one side.
meanings.sent3: The leaning lamp post seemed to be whispering secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her leaning posture in the photo captured a moment frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The old house had a leaning roof that gave it a charming, crooked appearance.

meanings.definition: Showing a preference or tendency towards something
meanings.sent1: She had a leaning interest towards art history.
meanings.sent2: His leaning choice for dessert was always chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed a leaning affection for the cozy blanket on the couch.
meanings.sent4: His leaning passion for music was evident in every note he played.
meanings.sent5: The student's leaning towards science led her to conduct fascinating experiments.
